name: Array-search
tagline: A C-program to search for an element in an array
body:
# **PROGRAM TO SEARCH FOR ELEMENT IN ARRAY**

This program primarily implements the array search using **BINARY SEARCH** algorithm.
The prerequisites of this algorithm is a **sorted** array, which is implemented using **BUBBLE SORT**.
So the program takes the array input from user,sorts it and takes the input for the element to be searched.
The program uses two method to implement this: sort_arr and binary_search.

Program authored by:
Karthik.S(Github username: karthiksenthil)
Karthik.S.Bhat(Github username: karthik-swaxy)
